Author: buhrmi
Title: [ANN][ICO] Whitestone Coin - ICO from Japan: When Blockchain meets Art
Body: Whitestone Coin   ICO from Japan: When Blockchain meets Art     The token sale is LIVE with currently 30% bonus for early purchasers.     WHITEPAPER (EN) | WHITEPAPER (JP) | WHITEPAPER (ZH)    TELEGRAM | TWITTER | FACEBOOK          Hello all! We are building a new kind of art trading platform that offers benefits for all: Artists, art lovers, galleries, museums, appraisers, or even those who are new to art. The platform allows all parties to interact with each other, trade and settle for cryptocurrencies, while the blockchain keeps a public record for everybody to see and explore. Leveraging the trust that is inherent to this untamperable public record, we can remove a lot of fees and middlemen that are required to complete high-value transactions using old-fashioned systems.            Benefits   In addition to access to the platform, token holders will receive:    Benefit 1 - Karuizawa New Art Museum entry ticket   1 ticket per 10 tokens     Benefit 2 - Token holder benefit at Whitestone gallery   100 tokens or more - 10% discount  200 tokens or more - 15% discount  500 tokens or more - 20% discount  ※ Including artworks purchased from this crowdsale.  ※ Some artworks are not included in the award list.     Benefit 3 - Digital artwork as a special gift   All token holders who own 10 tokens or more will be able to access to the digital master of artworks by famous artist Naoko Tosa.          Roadmap / Milestones         Crowd funding   Q4 2017  ICO tokens will be released for collecting funds from investors in this phase. During the token sale period, investors are able to collect the tokens to support our future development and to gain better privileges on our Whitestone Foundation. The tokens are also tradable under our partner exchanges.     Development   Q2 2018  The development of our blockchain solution for an art auction will be started in the early of 2018. Gathering the significant amount of experts in this area to build up the best innovation on this art-tech, including the research works to support this project will, also be conducted prior to this phase.  Q1 2019  Within one year, we will finish the development of this project as then we will be able to invite participation from investors for joining this experience before the others. This event will be launched for a closed group at the Whitestone Ginza New Gallery.  Q2 2019  In this phase, the deployment for our blockchain based auction system will be ready on all of our Whitestone galleries around the World. Also, all the art objects will be registered into our own blockchain database and will be ready for the auction by that time.      Product launch   Q3 2019  When the technology meets art, our blockchain based art auction will go live. Our art market will be reachable on all around the World and increase the popularity for the master pieces of art. The way of art auction will be done differently from then.      We hope to bring something interesting and new to the world of fine art and we look forward to working together with you.

Author: orionluckyse7en
Title: [ANN][ICO] Whitestone Coin - ICO from Japan: When Blockchain meets Art
Body: It is interesting when talking about art and I am also an art lover, but different art when I associate with this project. I see this platform offers a lot of ease for its users, where one of them that interest me is to connect biometric data with blockchain and solve the question of authenticity. Of course this is very helpful and very useful for all parties, artists, art lovers, galleries, museums, appraisers. Really interesting concept...
